name: Multi-Perspective Research Workflow
description: Comprehensive research with parallel analysis from multiple perspectives

tasks.name: Research Planning and Scope Definition
tasks.description: Define research scope, methodology, and key questions
tasks.claudePrompt: Plan comprehensive research on '${research_topic}'. Define: 1) Research objectives and key questions, 2) Methodology for each perspective (${perspectives}), 3) Information sources and databases, 4) Success criteria and deliverables, 5) Timeline and resource allocation. Create a structured research plan.

tasks.name: Technical Research and Analysis
tasks.description: Deep technical analysis of the research topic
tasks.claudePrompt: Conduct technical research on '${research_topic}'. Focus on: 1) Current state of technology, 2) Technical challenges and limitations, 3) Recent breakthrough and innovations, 4) Implementation approaches, 5) Performance metrics and benchmarks, 6) Future technical directions. Provide detailed technical analysis.

tasks.name: Business and Market Analysis
tasks.claudePrompt: Analyze '${research_topic}' from business perspective. Research: 1) Market size and growth potential, 2) Key players and competitive landscape, 3) Business models and revenue streams, 4) Investment trends and funding, 5) Regulatory and compliance considerations, 6) Business risks and opportunities. Provide comprehensive business analysis.

tasks.name: Ethical and Social Impact Analysis
tasks.description: Ethical implications and social impact assessment
tasks.claudePrompt: Research ethical and social implications of '${research_topic}'. Analyze: 1) Ethical considerations and dilemmas, 2) Social impact and consequences, 3) Privacy and security concerns, 4) Bias and fairness issues, 5) Regulatory and policy implications, 6) Stakeholder perspectives and concerns. Provide ethical framework and recommendations.

tasks.name: Cross-Perspective Data Synthesis
tasks.description: Synthesize findings from all research perspectives
tasks.claudePrompt: Synthesize research findings from all perspectives on '${research_topic}'. Create: 1) Integrated analysis combining technical, business, and ethical insights, 2) Cross-perspective correlations and conflicts, 3) Key trends and patterns, 4) Gap analysis and future research needs, 5) Actionable insights and recommendations, 6) Risk-benefit analysis across all dimensions.

tasks.name: Comprehensive Research Report
tasks.claudePrompt: Generate a comprehensive research report on '${research_topic}' in ${output_format} format. Include: 1) Executive summary with key findings, 2) Detailed analysis from each perspective, 3) Integrated insights and synthesis, 4) Recommendations and action items, 5) Future research directions, 6) References and sources, 7) Appendices with supporting data. Make it suitable for stakeholders and decision-makers.
